import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Crear o Modificar Plan"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/plan"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint para crear un nuevo plan (si se envía todos los datos) o modificar uno existente.

**Nota:** El endpoint sirve tanto para creación como para edición.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"ID del plan (para modificación) o nuevo ID para creación.","example":"2"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Nombre del plan","example":"PLAN DE PRUEBA 2"},"qty_docs_invoice":{"type":"integer","description":"Cantidad de facturas permitidas","example":15},"qty_docs_payroll":{"type":"integer","description":"Cantidad de documentos de nómina permitidos","example":5},"qty_docs_radian":{"type":"integer","description":"Cantidad de documentos radian permitidos","example":10},"qty_docs_ds":{"type":"integer","description":"Cantidad de documentos soporte permitidos","example":5},"period":{"type":"integer","description":"Periodo de validez en meses","example":1},"state":{"type":"integer","description":"Estado del plan (1 = Activo)","example":1},"observation":{"type":"string","description":"Observaciones del plan","example":"NINGUNA"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Plan creado o modificado exitosamente","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
